member.name: M:MurderboxGamemode.CustomWalkController.GetHull
member.summary: Get the hull size for the player's collision.

member.name: M:MurderboxGamemode.CustomWalkController.UpdateBBox
member.summary: Update the size of the bbox. We should really trigger some shit if this changes.

member.name: M:MurderboxGamemode.CustomWalkController.Accelerate(Vector3,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Add our wish direction and speed onto our velocity.

member.name: M:MurderboxGamemode.CustomWalkController.UpdateGroundEntity(Sandbox.TraceResult)
member.summary: Check for a new ground entity.

member.name: M:MurderboxGamemode.CustomWalkController.ClearGroundEntity
member.summary: We're no longer on the ground, remove it.

member.name: M:MurderboxGamemode.CustomWalkController.TraceBBox(Vector3,Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Traces the current bbox and returns the result. liftFeet will move the start position up by this amount, while keeping the top of the bbox at the same position. This is good when tracing down because you won't be tracing through the ceiling above.

member.name: M:MurderboxGamemode.CustomWalkController.StayOnGround
member.summary: Try to keep a walking player on the ground when running down slopes, etc.
